attributes.action: I believe that popular fast food chain McDonalds owe me a free milkshake
attributes.background: I was pressured into making my order quickly due to a growing queue behind me and I decided on a strawberry milkshake, however upon sitting down to enjoy my meal I realised I should have gone with a vanilla milkshake instead. Based on these grounds I believe McDonalds owe me one free milkshake.
